webpageTitle: 御心が地にもなるように
mainBlurb: It has been almost 500 years since the name of Jesus was first proclaimed in Japan. Since then, the Japanese church has persevered with great endurance. Today, less than one percent of Japan's population is Christian.
invitationBlurb: We've created this website based on the Beneath the Surface prayer guide to take you deeper into 30 priority prayer topics for God's work in Japan.
bibleVerse: Look with your eyes, and hear with your ears, and set your heart upon all that I shall show you.
wePray: We pray that there is something on this website that God wants you to see, hear, or set your heart on. And we invite you to respond in faith.
callToAction: Will you join us in praying for Japan's spiritual breakthrough?

purchaseBlurb: The Beneath the Surface prayer guide was produced in collaboration with missionaries and leaders from 17 organizations in Japan. About 20,000 copies have been distributed around the world. It is also available in Japanese and a few other languages.
orderBlurb: Where are you ordering the booklet from?
